title: 2001: A Space Odyssey Trailer
description: The original trailer for Stanley Kubrick’s groundbreaking science fiction film. Useful as a cinematic test clip with strong visuals and sound design.

title: BBC Earth: Planet Earth II Official Trailer
description: A stunning trailer showcasing wildlife footage from Planet Earth II. Great test material for high-resolution visuals and nature storytelling.

title: Apple 1984 Super Bowl Ad
description: The famous Ridley Scott–directed Super Bowl commercial that introduced the Macintosh. Ideal test for shorter runtime and cultural reference.

title: What is Artificial Intelligence? | Andrew Ng | TED
description: Andrew Ng explains the basics of AI in a TED talk format. Perfect for testing spoken-word, educational content embedding.

title: Coldplay - The Scientist (Official Video)
description: A music video with reverse-shot storytelling. Great test for music embedding and different pacing from trailers or talks.
